title: Visit Visa for the United States (USA)
short_description: Travel to the United States for tourism, family visits, or short business trips with a valid B1/B2 visa.
overview: The United States Visit Visa, commonly known as the B1/B2 visa, allows foreign nationals to travel temporarily for tourism, leisure, medical treatment, or short business visits. It provides an opportunity to explore the U.S., visit family and friends, or attend conferences and meetings.
key_features_title: Key Highlights of the U.S. Visit Visa
key_features: Duration: Up to 6 months per visit
Issued for 1–10 years depending on nationality
Requires in-person interview at a U.S. consulate
benefits_title: Benefits of a U.S. Visit Visa
benefits: Explore popular destinations like New York, Los Angeles, and Washington D.C.
Meet relatives and attend social or family events
Participate in short-term business or training programs
technologies_used: U.S. Department of State Consular Electronic Application Center (CEAC)
U.S. Visa Information and Appointment Services Portal
cta_text: Apply for Your U.S. Visit Visa

title: Visit Visa for Australia
short_description: Discover Australia’s stunning landscapes and vibrant cities with a Visitor Visa (Subclass 600).
overview: Australia’s Visitor Visa (Subclass 600) is designed for tourists, family visitors, and short-term business travelers. It allows you to enjoy sightseeing, visit relatives, or attend business meetings while experiencing the unique Australian lifestyle.
key_features_title: Key Highlights of the Australia Visitor Visa
key_features: Stream options: Tourist, Family Sponsored, or Business Visitor
benefits: Explore world-famous destinations like Sydney, Melbourne, and the Great Barrier Reef
Visit friends and family residing in Australia
Participate in business meetings or short conferences
Apply easily online with fast processing times
technologies_used: Department of Home Affairs Visitor Visa Services
Electronic Travel Authority (ETA) System for eligible countries
cta_text: Apply for Your Australian Visitor Visa

title: Visit Visa for New Zealand
short_description: Experience New Zealand’s natural beauty and warm hospitality with a Visitor Visa.
overview: New Zealand’s Visitor Visa allows travelers to enter the country for tourism, family visits, or short business activities. It provides flexibility for those who want to explore the country’s breathtaking scenery, attend events, or visit friends and family.
key_features_title: Key Highlights of the New Zealand Visitor Visa
key_features: Stay up to 9 months within an 18-month period
Online application through Immigration New Zealand portal
Quick eVisa processing for eligible applicants
benefits: Discover scenic destinations like Queenstown and Rotorua
Meet friends and family living in New Zealand
Attend short-term business meetings or events
Enjoy a visa process designed for global travelers
Option to extend stay if conditions are met
cta_text: Apply for Your New Zealand Visitor Visa
